text: Android services An Android service is a component that is designed to do some work withot a user interface. A service might download a file, play music, or apply a filte to an image. Services can also be used for process communication (IPC) between Android applications. Broadcast Receivers They respond to broadcast messages from apps or from the system. When a file is downloaded, or when the Wi-Fi is active, low battery. Content provider They supply data to other applications. The data can be stored in a file, on a database, or on other systems (google cloud)
